ProductInfo.Features:
16.15-megapixel, 1/2.3" CCD sensor: Captures high-resolution images up to 4608 x 3456 pixels
25x optical/4x digital/100x total zoom: Through a 4.3-107.5mm zoom lens delivers precise zooming and crystal clarity
3" LCD monitor: With 230K pixels allows you to easily frame and review your shots
Optical image stabilization: Helps minimize blur brought on by camera shake and vibration
Panorama mode: Makes it easy to capture expansive vistas by panning the camera
ProductInfo.Name: Kodak PIXPRO AZ251 Digital Camera, 16.15MP, 25x Optical Zoom, 3" LCD Display, HDMI/USB 2.0, Panorama Mode, Optical Image Stabilization, White
